subject: Attention:Beneficiary,
body:
Attention:Beneficiary,
Have you received your payment which was scheduled to be remitted to you on 25th January 2024.
 You have to confirm back to this investigation office if you have been fully paid and compensated.
Kindly specify the following below:
FULL NAME:
AMOUNT TRANSFERRED:
AMOUNT EXPECTING:
DIRECT MOBILE NUMBER:
I will be waiting to hear from you immediately. Get back to me on my direct email address: (
unitednationassistedprogram@onionmail.com
)
Thank You.
Mr Philip Brown
Funds investigator

subject: Re: Attention:Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Mr. Philip Brown,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm not quite sure what payment you're referring to. Could you please provide more details about it? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Pamela
